pageContext.claim: “President Obama told me that. He said, 'The biggest problem -- I don't know how to solve it.' He told me doesn't know how to solve it. I said, 'Did you ever call him?' 'No.' Actually, he tried 11 times. But the man on the other side -- the gentleman on the side did not take his call. Okay? Lack of respect. But he takes my call.”
pageContext.analysis: There is absolutely no evidence that Obama tried to call North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, let alone meet him.
